text:
Kira Systems | Clojure Developers and Quality Engineers | Toronto | ONSITE | VISA | https://kirasystems.com/careers

We build machine learning powered applications to help law firms, audit firms, and corporations review and understand contracts. As one of the fastest growing companies in this space, we're looking to hire many new developers to work in our HQ in Toronto.

Our technology stack is built on Clojure, ClojureScript, Go, and C++. If any of these technologies interests you please apply, we welcome people of all skill levels.

Clojure: https://kirasystems.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0mjvz/

Clojure Lead: https://kirasystems.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk01efu/

Quality Engineer: https://kirasystems.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk01r6o/
